message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product and I think it would be perfect for you! I'm offering it to you for $175. Let me know what you think.
Hi Alice, $175 is a bit high for me. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only willing to pay $100 for it. Let me know what you think.

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product. While $100 is significantly lower than what I'm hoping to get, I'm willing to come down to $130. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know if you're interested in this offer.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price. I'm still only able to offer $110 at this point. It's a good deal for both of us, and I'm confident you'll find another buyer if you don't accept.
